purposeDescriptions.low: very slowly increases the temperature of the affected area until it reaches a caster defined temperature
purposeDescriptions.mid: rapidly increases the temperature of the affected area until it reaches a caster defined temperature
purposeDescriptions.high: near-instantly spikes the temperature of the affected area to a caster defined temperature
purposeDescriptions.invLow: very slowly dencreases the temperature of the affected area until it reaches a caster defined temperature
purposeDescriptions.invMid: rapidly dencreases the temperature of the affected area until it drops a caster defined temperature
purposeDescriptions.invHigh: near-instantly freeze the affected area down to a caster defined temperature
